net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse

Class SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH extends SQLiteHouse>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH>
  • Enclosing class:
    SQLiteHouse<DSC extends SQLiteHouse>

    public static class SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH extends SQLiteHouse>
extends java.lang.Object
    A short-lived, open data structure which provides context for various operations within the class. Because so many of the values fetched here must be reused multiple times within the body of certain larger functions, or must be passed between functions, it is useful to have all of these fields gathered in a single contextual container.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.4 (#26)

    • Method Detail

      • loadTableDef

        public <TBL extends SQLightable> SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH> loadTableDef(java.lang.Class<TBL> cls)
        Loads contextual information pertaining to the table defined by the specified schematic class. This operation clears all previously-loaded table data, and any data that might have been loaded for a column of that table.
        Type Parameters:
        TBL - the schematic class
        Parameters:
        cls - the schematic class
        Returns:
        (fluid)

      • loadColumnDef

        public SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH> loadColumnDef(java.lang.reflect.Field fld)
        Loads contextual information pertaining to a column of the table already set by loadTableDef(java.lang.Class<TBL>). This operation will clear the value of any previously-analyzed column.
        Parameters:
        fld - the field to be set for context
        Returns:
        (fluid)

      • loadColumnDef

        public SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH> loadColumnDef(java.lang.String sSoughtName)
        Loads contextual information pertaining to a column of the table set by loadTableDef(java.lang.Class<TBL>), by searching for that column by its name. This operation will clear the value of any previously-analyzed column.
        Parameters:
        sSoughtName - the name of the column to be set for context
        Returns:
        (fluid)

      • clearColumnDef

        protected SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH> clearColumnDef()
        Clears any and all contextual data pertaining to a table column.
        Returns:
        (fluid)

      • loadColumnValue

        public <T extends SQLightable> SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH> loadColumnValue(T o)
                                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                                                             SchematicException
        If the context is bound to a specific column, then this method will try to discover the value of the field corresponding to that column in the specified object instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the schematic class
        Parameters:
        o - the schematic object that contains the column field
        Returns:
        (fluid)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if inadequate context has been loaded
        SchematicException - if something goes wrong while setting the value
